name: The Flea Flea Hotel
description:
Welcome to the Flea Flea Hotel!

In this game, you play as Seth the Spider and shoeshiner, and your goal is to find out how many Centipedes and Millipedes there are in this hotel.

Watch out though, there is a five minute timer which is there to allow people to take turns with the game.

Controls:

Z: Interact

X: Skip text

Arrow Keys: Move
